data.title: Enterprise Products Beats Q4 Forecasts, Targets $6 Billion In 2025 Expansions
data.description: EPD reported Q4 2024 sales decline of 2.9% YoY to $14.201B, beating consensus. Adjusted EBITDA rose to $2.59B and EPS was 74 cents. 2025 outlook includes $4-4.5B in organic growth investments and $525M in sustaining expenses.

data.title: McDonald's To $290? Here Are 10 Top Analyst Forecasts For Tuesday
Palantir Stock Is Surging Tuesday: What's Going On?
data.description: Palantir Technologies Inc (NASDAQ:PLTR) shares are trading higher Tuesday after the company reported better-than-expected financial results for the fourth quarter and issued strong guidance. Several analysts also lifted price targets following the print.

data.title: Spotify Q4 Earnings: Revenue Beat, Higher ARPU and Premium Growth Drive Profitability, Issues Strong Q1 Outlook
data.description: Spotify Technology (SPOT) stock gained on better-than-expected Q4 2024 results. Revenue up 16%, monthly average users and subscribers beat expectations.

data.title: Quantum BioPharma Stock Is Soaring Tuesday: What's Driving The Action?
data.description: Quantum BioPharma Ltd (NASDAQ:QNTM) shares are rising Tuesday after the company announced positive clinical trial results for its unbuzzd dietary supplement.
